thread.title: Southern States Machinery to host Steel Tech 2024
thread.title_full: Southern States Machinery to host Steel Tech 2024

author: The Fabricator
title: Southern States Machinery to host Steel Tech 2024
text: Southern States Machinery to host Steel Tech 2024 Southern States Machinery has announced the return of its annual machine tool expo, [Steel Tech 2024](https://southernstatesmachinery.com/events/trade-shows/steel-tech-2024/), that showcases the latest advancements in manufacturing technology. Scheduled for May 14-16 at the companyâ€™s Mooresville, N.C., facility, the expo will feature more than 30 powered machines and more than 40 industry brands. Attendees will be able to explore new metal fabricating equipment for applications from precision sheet metal processing to steel/plate fabrication. In addition to exhibitions and demos, the event will offer educational seminars covering topics such as automation, bending, forming, cutting, routing, finishing, and software. subscribe now The Fabricator is North America's leading magazine for the metal forming and fabricating industry. The magazine delivers the news, technical articles, and case histories that enable fabricators to do their jobs more efficiently. The Fabricator has served the industry since 1970.
